short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the festive glow of a Christmas tree with twinkling lights on your new tab page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This live wallpaper brings the magic of the holiday season directly to your browser. Each time you open a new tab, you're greeted by a beautifully decorated Christmas tree, adorned with shimmering lights and colorful ornaments. Watch as the lights blink and twinkle, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The soft glow of the tree and gentle snowfall outside add to the holiday charm.

Customize the experience with various light effects, such as synchronized flashing, soft glows, and peaceful background music. Whether you're getting into the holiday spirit or simply enjoying a peaceful moment, this extension turns every new tab into a cheerful Christmas celebration. Let the glowing lights of the Christmas tree fill your screen and your heart with joy all season long!
